channel.title: (web)Client issue
channel.description:
Alrighty, I've jar'd my PI Client, and running the jar directly loads the client completely, however when trying to execute via a browser it doesn't load completely, and sits in at 'starting up'.
My applet code is:
[code]<applet name="Webclient" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> </applet>[/code]
Any ideas on why the applet won't load? It is loading from the same local files, also.
EDIT: Now getting a java run error on the webpage...
[code]load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class [/code]
But it still runs when I double click it? any ideas? anyone? :/

item.title: (web)Client issue
item.dc:creator: @run_moneygod run moneygod
item.description:
@run_moneygod wrote:

Yea ok upload ur .jar to like dropbox.com and then copy link change client.jar to the dl link if don’t work then u have not coded client correct if so add me on msn tarb@live.co.uk r just add my any wayz

From my blackberry

Read full topic

item.title: (web)Client issue
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Alrighty, I’ve jar’d my PI Client, and running the jar directly loads the client completely,
however when trying to execute via a browser it doesn’t load completely, and sits in at ‘starting up’.

My applet code is:

<applet name="Webclient" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class"> </applet>

Any ideas on why the applet won’t load? It is loading from the same local files, also.

EDIT:
Now getting a java run error on the webpage…

load: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class

But it still runs when I double click it? any ideas? anyone?
